name: Computer Doctor 2000
description:
Get inside a broken computer and explore the world of electrical components. Talk to them to find out what they are thinking and how they are doing. Find friends to fix the computer together.

Game controls:

  • Look - mouse
  • Walk - WASD keys
  • Jump - Space key
  • Interact - E key

System controls:

  • Toggle fullscreen - F key
  • Toggle low\high graphics quality (to get higher FPS) - L key

Game made for Godot Wild Jam #37, theme "INSIDE THE MACHINE".

Made with Godot engine. Software used: Blender, Adobe Medium, Photoshop, FL Studio, Audacity. All character models and cafe shop was sculpted in VR.

Team:

  • Fyodor Shchukin - design
  • Craig Ostrin - programming
  • Bakenshake - writer
  • Downhill2k01 - music and SFX
